pull.title: test: Disable other targets when enable-fuzz is set
pull.body:
This is to fix https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/16094

When the `enable-fuzz` flag is set, disable all other binary targets.

events.message: Disable other targets when enable-fuzz is set

events.body:
Concept ACK

Thanks for working on this: this makes our `configure` script more user-friendly.

Nice first-time contribution!

Concept ACK
@theuni can you please take a look at the build system change
Please update the `./configure` lines in `doc/fuzzing.md` as well: You can remove the `--disable-bench ...` part.

issue.title: Fuzzing framework support
issue.body:
As the title says, adding fuzzing framework support so we can start getting serious on this area as well.

Adapted the following PRs:

* #9172.
* #9354.
* #9691.
* #10415.
* #10440.
* #15043.
* #15047.
* #15295.
* #15399 (fabcfa5f0cfe2484fe5cf5ced7cbae34a35c47c9 only).
* #16338.
* #17051.
* #17076.
* #17225.
* #17942.
* #16236 (only fa35c4239f9b5a35ed46d0af8472c74610cba5c4).
* #18166 (only f2472f64604a0c583f950c56e8753d0bee246388).
* #18300.
* And.. probably will go further and continue adapting more PRs..
